list_definition.mean_english: gửi nhiều bản sao của một thông điệp
list_definition.definition: to send many copies of a message (= “junk”) on the Internet

list_ex_of_english: Sending spam and deliberately creating disorder and malfunctions must be made punishable.
The whole idea of opt-in has been put forward as the solution to end spam.
False positives - spam that makes it through the filter - are quickly dealt with, and increase the accuracy of the filter with each use.
The first tries to identify spam mail by the key word cash in the mail subject.
Why do the governments want to preserve spam ?
In this domain, the classification tasks to be tackled are twofold: filtering spam is a binary decision, while pre-ordering of mails into existing folders is a more sophisticated learning task.
Disruptive knowledge or 'semantic spam' will also need to be dealt with.
What we are being targeted with is not spam.
